about_the_game:
Sorry Grim, the afterlife is under new management! Become the new ruler of the afterlife. Summon spooky friends to reside in your unearthly realm and decorate it however you like with items you can craft, buy and find.

Your friends in undeath

The afterlife would be a pretty lonely place without some friends to keep you company. Summon a colourful range of spirits to reside on your ghostly island. From an old wise skeleton, to a sassy sasquatch, there are plenty of creepy and cute characters who would like to call your realm home.

Customise your lil lich

Fashion isn't dead in the afterlife. Wear a range of clothes and accessories to truly customise your incorporeal form. It might not be sunny, but you can still wear sunglasses or how about a sword and crown to show the grim reapers evil ghouls who's the new boss? You'll just have to find the right residents who will sell you their collection of clothes first.

Who says the afterlife has to be spooky?

Not a fan of the macabre? In my lil afterlife you can decorate your island however you choose, why not style it like an american diner or a tranquil park? Or, if you enjoy the spooky side of the afterlife, you can go all in with graves, corn mazes and jack-o-lanterns. Items can be brought from residents, crafted or even found when exploring the reapers tower.

Reap the reapers tower

The old ruler of the afterlife, the Grim Reaper, has gone mad with power and confined himself to his tower where his loyal servants keep watch. Delve into his domain and fight his army of fearsome ghouls using your spine-tingling spells. Its worth the rewards, from crafting ingredients to rare decorations, the tower holds many treasures.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
